targets.expr: sum without(instance, pod) (op_challenger_executors{cluster=${cluster:doublequote},namespace=${namespace:doublequote}, status="active"}) / ignoring (status) (sum without (status, instance, pod) (op_challenger_executors{cluster=${cluster:doublequote},namespace=${namespace:doublequote}}))
count_over_time ({cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", app="op-challenger"} | logfmt lvl | label_format level=lvl | level != "" | level != "info" [5m])
{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", app="op-challenger"} | logfmt | lvl = `error` | label_format level=lvl
{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", app="op-challenger"} | logfmt | lvl = `warn` | label_format level=lvl
